About Me

Inquisitive and autodidact web developer with professional experience in a range of hands-on projects (front to back-end). I'm converting intellectual property into web applications using the latest web development technologies (MERN and FreMP stacks).

When I am not exposed to blue monitor light, I am an avid off-roader (Go Jimny!) and scuba diver. I enjoy participating in team efforts that leverage current knowledge of web development in ways that have real impact. I am currently looking for the next fascinating project to work on!
